Implementations of simple finders for Keith Numbers and Primeval Numbers.

For example, the Primeval numbers, along with the number of primes the decompose to, was calculated by primeval.c up t 10 digits:
```
      number  primes
          2       1
         13       3
         37       4
        107       5
        113       7
        137      11
       1013      14
       1037      19
       1079      21
       1237      26
       1367      29
       1379      31
      10079      33
      10123      35
      10136      41
      10139      53
      10237      55
      10279      60
      10367      64
      10379      89
      12379      96
      13679     106
     100279     122
     100379     153
     101237     188
     102347     248
     102379     311
     103679     349
     123479     402
    1001237     421
    1002347     547
    1002379     705
    1003679     812
    1012349     906
    1012379    1098
    1023457    1162
    1023467    1268
    1023479    1662
    1234579    1738
    1234679    1953
   10012349    2418
   10012379    2920

   10023467    3457
```
